data.title: Questacon: The National Science and Technology Centre
data.meta_description: Science brings smiles to everyone’s faces at Questacon – the National Science and Technology Centre. This playground for adults and kids alike is full of weird
data.text: Science brings smiles to everyone’s faces at Questacon – the National Science and Technology Centre. This playground for adults and kids alike is full of weird and wonderful spaces for you to play and discover. Feel the force of an earthquake, watch an explosive science show, make friends with dinosaurs and experience the exhilaration of weightlessness as you slide down the two-storey vertical ‘Free Fall’.
